sentences.sContent: The most popular colours appeared to be “white, ” “black” and “beige”.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most popular colours appeared to be “white, ” “black” and “beige”.
sentences.sCn: “白色”、“黑色”和“米色”是出现频率最高的颜色。

sentences.sContent: Beyond that, through another open door, was a large bed made up like the ones in the hotel—a beige comforter, lots of pillows arranged upright against the headboard.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beyond that, through another open door, was a large bed made up like the ones in the hotel—a beige comforter, lots of pillows arranged upright against the headboard.
sentences.sCn: 除此之外，透过另一扇开着的门，可以看到像是饭店房间里的大床——铺着米黄色的被子，床头板上竖直靠着许多枕头。

sentences.sContent: We're also using silk and some very strong cotton and trying out new prints, but keeping the colors I love ─ blacks, grays and beige.
sentences.sContent_eng: We're also using silk and some very strong cotton and trying out new prints, but keeping the colors I love ─ blacks, grays and beige.
sentences.sCn: 我们还选用了丝绸和很有韧性的棉布，尝试新的图案，但同时保留我喜欢的颜色──黑色、灰色和米黄色。

phrases.pCn: 褐皮书；黄皮书（由美国联邦储备委员会公布的经济报告）

trans.tranCn: 浅褐色的；米黄色的；枯燥乏味的
